member.name: MFVideo3DFormat
member.summary: Specifies how 3D video frames are stored in memory.

member.name: MFVideo3DFormat.MFVideo3DSampleFormat_BaseView
member.summary: The base view is stored in a single buffer. The other view is discarded.

member.name: MFVideo3DFormat.MFVideo3DSampleFormat_MultiView
member.summary: Each media sample contains multiple buffers, one for each view.

member.name: MFVideo3DFormat.MFVideo3DSampleFormat_Packed_LeftRight
member.summary: Each media sample contains one buffer, with both views packed side-by-side into a single frame.

member.name: MFVideo3DFormat.MFVideo3DSampleFormat_Packed_TopBottom
member.summary: Each media sample contains one buffer, with both views packed top-and-bottom into a single frame.
